name: Far away!
description:
This game is about 2 little guys who are really far away trying to work together to solve the puzzle. With traps, triggers, and moving boxes. It's a puzzle solving game made for kiwijam 2022.

Tutorial ----------

          Up, Down, Left, Right arrow keys to move

          Avoid traps

Sorry, I thought the upload might take a little bit. Also level 2 is glitched out.
